name: The Ball Is Jumping, The Game Is Annoying
name_original: The Ball Is Jumping, The Game Is Annoying
description:
The ball jumps very fast. But it is not exactly.

The ball jumps forward.

Sometimes it jumps in place ( it's annoying).

Sometimes he jumps back for a long time ( it's annoying too).  To make this moment even more annoying, you will lose points when you moving back .

Red zones are killing.  You need to click or touch to unlock red zones.
